title: Gregg Popovich Trolls NBA Reporter
text:
Get Sports Alerts 
29 Sep 2015 07:00 AM EST 
San Antonio Spurs coach Gregg Popovich is the man the rest of the NBA fears every spring. He's also the NBA's foremost troll, both lauded and loathed for the taciturn interviews he regularly gives reporters during the season. Popovich's latest antics come from the NBA's Monday media jamboree, in which every team met with reporters to build hype for the 2015-16 season that starts in about a month. NBATV’s Jared Greenberg was there in San Antonio, just doing his best — but Pop was having none of it until finally breaking character with a grin after taking Greenberg for quite a ride. When you've won five NBA titles, like Pop has, you've earned the right to have a little fun. And this definitely beats when coaches actually treat reporters like crap. That's just plain rude, man.
